```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
library(svAssert)
```

The {svAssert} package provides tools for defensive programming in R, with fast, but versatile assertions partly based on {checkmate}, and meaningful and rich-formatted error messages using `rlang::abort()` and `cli::cli_abort()`, rebadged as `stop()` and using the base R mechanism for message translation in various natural languages.
